entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Mount Carleton (Provincial Park)

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 29 December 2022
